text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/vrdr/CodeSystem/CodeSystem-death-pregnancy-status
    CodeDisplay
    1Not pregnant within past year
    2Pregnant at time of death
    3Not pregnant, but pregnant within 42 days of death
    4Not pregnant, but pregnant 43 days to 1 year before death
    7Not reported on certificate
    9Unknown if pregnant within the past year
  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-NullFlavor
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    NANot applicableKnown to have no proper value (e.g., last menstrual period for a male).

name: DeathPregnancyStatusVS
title: Death Pregnancy Status ValueSet
description: A set of codes that reflect whether the decedent was pregnant at or around the time of death. Based on [Pregnancy Status (NCHS)[2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.6003]](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?oid=2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.6003).
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement

concept.display: Not pregnant, but pregnant within 42 days of death
Not pregnant, but pregnant 43 days to 1 year before death
Unknown if pregnant within the past year
